About the League

2013 Lax 4 Life Fall League
September 7th through December 1st
Certified HS Referees – Concessions – Vendors
COMMITTED TEAMS
Oviedo | Flagler
Winter Springs | Olympia
Lake Brantley | Lake Howell
Lake Mary | Winter Park
Bishop Moore | Boone
West Orange | Dr. Phillips
Timber Creek | St. Eds
GAME FORMAT
25 minute running clock per half with a 5 minute half time. Official HS rules for field play.
Teams will be put in one of three brackets and compete for first place on Championship Day.
Top

Location: TBD
Games to take place between 9:00 AM and 3:00 PM.
Open to all Central Florida Players.
US Lacrosse Membership is not required for our League.

ELIGIBLE PLAYER
Players from 8th – 12th grade

Brackets & Scores
September 8th Schedule

Lax 4 Life will have its games days starting in September and running through December.
Below find the exact dates:

Session 1 Session 2
League Play 09/07/2013 League Play 10/19/2013
League Play 09/14/2013 League Play 10/26/2013
League Play 09/28/2013 League Play 11/02/2013
League Play 10/05/2013 League Play 11/16/2013
Championship Day 10/12/2013 Championship Day 11/23/2013
Top

The goal of our fall league is very simple; get ready for regular season tryouts in January. Our league gives CF HS players the opportunity to become familiar with their teammates as well as begin conditioning for the upcoming season.

Upcoming ninth graders can also learn what it’s like to play with and against high school athletes. This will better prepare them to compete at the HS level. It will also give up-and-coming players that are competing to make a team (Varsity or JV) that additional time to work on their game.

Florida is playing a catch up game compared to the lacrosse players in the more traditional regions. If you are interested in being an impact player at the high school level, and also play at the next level, competing in as many leagues as you can during the off season is a must.

Top

Fees

Plan A – $225 – Both Sessions – 2 games each Saturday – 10 Saturdays – (20 games total)
Plan B – $140 – Both Sessions – 1 game each Saturday – 10 Saturdays – (10 games total)
Plan C – $140 – One Session – 2 games each Saturday – 5 Saturdays – (10 games total)
Plan D – $ 85 – One Session – 1 game each Saturday – 5 Saturdays – (5 games total)

Our fall league is without a doubt, the best value for lacrosse at any level. $225 per player covers the cost for 20 games in both sessions. That’s $12.50 per game per players.

Most tournaments will cost over $200 which includes tournament fees, hotel and travel. At that tournament, you’ll play 4 – 5 games. That averages out to be about $50 – $60 per game.

In our league, you will also be playing some of the best competition in the state. Last year, 6 teams from the top 10 in the state played in our league.
